reviews.text:
Harvest is one of my all-time faves. The service is always good, the food delicious and vibes on point. 

My favorite menu items are the margherita pizza...
This place brought it on every level.  The place is nice and casual, with the indoor-outdoor dining.  We were out front, under umbrellas-so nice!  The staff...
I met a friend for lunch and we sat outside to eat. I ordered a meatball sub and a side of Napa slaw. The sub was very good and flavorful. The bun soft and...
